page.content:
HEALTH AND MEDICAL FACILITIES
There is a DOCTOR'S and DENTIST'S SURGERY held in Cargreen once a week. The nearest hospital is at Saltash - 6 miles distant, providing minimal facilities. The main hospital service is in Plymouth - 11 miles distant. There is a DISTRICT NURSE service as and when required, and a HOME HELP service for the elderly and disabled. There is a large proportion of elderly people in the village. Their recreational needs are catered for by an organisation known as the 'Good Companions', and younger villagers also keep an eye on the welfare of the elderly.
